SELECT DESCRIPTION, FACTORYNAME AS FACTORAY_NAME FROM POP_MESFACTORY WHERE RESOURCESTATE = 'InService' AND FACTORYTYPE = 'ProductionFactory'
AND FACTORYNAME LIKE '%' || #{factoryName} || '%'
ORDER BY FACTORYNAME ASC
SELECT ENUMVALUE AS VALUE, ENUMVALUE AS DISPLAY FROM POP_ENUMDEFVALUE WHERE ENUMNAME = 'ProductionType'

SELECT LIST AS DESCRIPTION, LIST AS DIV FROM YMS_UI_OPTION WHERE MODULEID = 'COMMON' AND CLASS1 = 'LINE'
AND CLASS2 = #{factoryName}
AND LIST LIKE '%' || #{div} || '%'
ORDER BY ORDEROPT
SELECT LIST FROM YMS_UI_OPTION WHERE CLASS1 = 'STEP' ORDER BY ORDEROPT ASC
